## Block.dispose() method

Dispose of this block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
dispose(healStack?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  healStack | boolean | _(Optional)_ If true, then try to heal any gap by connecting the next statement with the previous statement. Otherwise, dispose of all children of this block. |

**Returns:**

void
